data.title: Take Orbital Forensic Snapshot
data.description:
[Executes an Orbital forensic snapshot]
[Supported observables: IP address, hostname, AMP GUID]

Workflow Description:
When triggered, this workflow will initiate an Orbital forensic snapshot for the endpoint identified by the provided observable.

Workflow Requirements:
This workflow requires the Orbital_Credentials account key be configured with Orbital API credentials. Please verify these settings prior to execution.

data.title: AMP Host Isolation with Tier 2 Approval
data.description:
[Request Tier 2 Approval for AMP Host Isolation]
[Supported observable: AMP GUID]

Workflow Description:
When triggered, this workflow requests approval to isolate an endpoint using AMP host isolation. If approved, isolation is enabled using the CTR AMP isolation response action. 

Workflow Requirements:
This workflow requires the Task Approver and Task Requestor global variables be populated. If you want to send emails, you need to enable the Send Email activity and verify your SMTP target configuration. Please verify these settings prior to execution. 
Since the workflow uses the CTR response action, please ensure the endpoint can be isolated using the "AMP For Endpoints" module from the pivot menu.

data.title: Move Computer to AMP Triage Group
data.description:
[Move Computer to AMP Triage Group]
[Supported observables: IP address, hostname, AMP GUID]

Workflow Description:
When triggered, this workflow will move the endpoint identified by the provided observable to an AMP triage device group.

Workflow Requirements:
This workflow requires the Triage Group Name local variable to be populated and valid AMP API credentials in the AMP_Credentials account key. Please verify these settings prior to execution.

data.title: W0080b - isolate endpoint from_hostname
data.description: isolate endpoint by hostname in Secure Endpoint. Supported observable type: hostname
